value:
Can I try to engage with you? It may
not work, but it's worth a shot.
Emblem engage! Hmm, nope.

My mother was everything a Divine
Dragon should be. I will honor her
last wish and bring peace to Elyos.

That weapon of yours looks a little
tarnished. Want me to polish it up
for you?

I saw the most adorable owl earlier!
Do you think anyone would mind
if I adopted her?

Hm? Sorry, I must have nodded off.
You have a very gentle way of waking
people up, you know. It's nice.

I am the Divine Dragon Alear. I came
here to honor the bond between
you and $Nf.

I hope to be as strong as my mother
one day.
As long as I'm improving, I'm happy.
Sorry, everyone...

Thank you so much. I promise to use
this to help protect everyone.

I'm the Divine Dragon Alear. I never
imagined I'd be called upon like this,
but I'm here to help however I can.

Thought I might find you here. This is
where you come to rest after a battle,
isn't it, $Nu?$k$pHm? How do I know? Well, I've been
watching you, to get to know you
better. Want to know what I've seen?$k$pYou're a wonderful person. In fact,
the more we work together, the more
you remind me of the Emblems.$k$pMaybe it's just our connection, our
bond of friendship, that reminds me
of how I felt around them.$k$pIt's that warmth I think of, more than
any ring. That feeling you get when
you're sure someone is there for you.$k$pSo, I want to be that for you as well.
I want to be by your side, protecting
you to the end. Consider it a promise.
I am the Divine Dragon!
This ends now.
Grant me strength!
I am guided by the Emblems.
Mother...
I'd like to be as much of a help to you as the Emblems were to me.
Oh! Hi! Good to see you.
The sky is gorgeous here. Sometimes I feel like I'm back on the Somniel.
Some of the Heroes here look an awful lot like certain Emblems I know. I can't wait to talk to them!
Want to hear a secret? I only ever get bed head on the blue side of my hair.
I don't know if I'll ever get used to not having an Emblem Ring...
How do I merge with an Emblem? I just shout "Emblem, Engage!" Go on, give it a try. You never know.
I understand.
What to doâ€¦
I've got this.
